ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors acknowledge the assistance of Mr. Christopher Chapano, a taxonomist, with the National Herbarium and Botanical Gardens, Harare, Zimbabwe, in the authentication of the plant sample names. Support from the Swedish International Development Agency (SIDA) through the International Science Programmes (ISP IPICS: ZIM01, Uppsala University, Uppsala, Sweden) under the title “Biomolecular interactions analyses” and the International Foundation in Sciences (IFS F/3413-03F, Stockholm, Sweden) under the title: “Screening natural plant products from selected plants from Zimbabwe as a source of anti-infective compounds for phytomedicines development” is acknowledged.
